name: Joseph R. Click
summary: Technical sales engineer with experience leading presales engagements, managing proof of concepts, and bridging technical and business requirements across diverse enterprise environments.

responsibilities: Designed and delivered custom software demos addressing client-specific pain points.
Led end-to-end Proof of Concept projects to demonstrate ROI.
Integrated advanced REST APIs and cloud platforms including Salesforce, Shopify, Databricks.
Collaborated cross-functionally with engineering and product teams.
Supported sales teams and influenced product roadmap through advisory boards.
Served as SME in presales engagements and bridged technical and business needs.
Handled technical implementations with focus on security, identity, and PII.
Managed a team of technical engineers and developed a culture of customer focus.
Led enterprise implementation projects involving complex infrastructure and IAM.
Delivered presentations and technical documentation for high-stakes sales engagements.
Created training materials and best practices guides.
Worked in law firms, startups, web development, logistics, and sole proprietorship.
Published a book and built experience across legal, tech, and business domains.
